summary: A 12-year-old boy comes of age in 1969 Key West against the backdrop of the Apollo moon landing, when he begins to sell cocaine so his mother can stop stripping.

Wolf|Ray Bastenero|Rebel
keywords: year 1969|vietnam war veteran|based on novella|begins with voice over narration|strip club
title: CrissCross
